title: Ordering and induction lemmas for the integers

blocks.name: monotuz
blocks.content: A function defined on an upper set of integers which increases at every adjacent pair is globally strictly monotonic by induction. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm monotuz(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(c5, clt, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c7, cr))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c8))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(c7, c6))

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c7, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(c7, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  -| diffsc(s0, c7)

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)

  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

blocks.name: monotoddzzfi
blocks.content: A function which is odd and monotonic on ` NN0 ` is monotonic on ` ZZ ` . This proof is far too long. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: monotoddzz
blocks.content: A function (given implicitly) which is odd and monotonic on ` NN0 ` is monotonic on ` ZZ ` . This proof is far too long. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: oddcomabszz
blocks.content: An odd function which takes nonnegative values on nonnegative arguments commutes with ` abs ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Sep-2014.)

blocks.content: Induction on nonnegative integers with two base cases, for use with Lucas-type sequences. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)

thm 2nn0ind(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5, wff w6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), w0)
  -| w1

  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wi(wa(w3, w4), w5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), nat0), wb(w6, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), nat1), wb(w6, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), wb(w6, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w6, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wb(w6, w5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wb(w6, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)

  -| diffsw(s1, w4)
  -| diffsw(s1, w5)
} = {
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cn0), w0, wsbc(s1, c0, w6))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cn0), wsbc(s1, c0, w6), wa(wsbc(s1, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), w6), wsbc(s1, co(c0, caddc, nat1), w6)))

  sbceq1d(s1, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), co(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), w6)
  oveq1(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)
  dfsbcq(s1, cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), w6)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wsbc(s1, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), w6), wsbc(s1, cv(hs0), w6), wsbc(s1, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), w6), wsbc(s1, co(c0, caddc, nat1), w6))

blocks.name: zindbi
blocks.content: Inductively transfer a property to the integers if it holds for zero and passes between adjacent integers in either direction. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)

blocks.pretty:
thm zindbi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℤ →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ ℤ →(w2 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s1 = s0 →(w4 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 =(s0[+]1)→(w4 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s1 = 0 →(w4 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ (s1 = c0 →(w4 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w4)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w3)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ∈ ℤ, w0, w1, [c0 / s1]w4)
  syl5bbr(c0 ∈ ℤ, w0, [c0 / s1]w4, [0 / s1]w4)
  sbcie(s1, nat0, w4, w0)
  c0ex()
  mpjaodan(c0 ∈ ℤ, ([0 / s1]w4 ↔[c0 / s1]w4), 0[≤]c0, c0[≤]0)
  mp3an1(c0 ∈ ℤ, 0[≤]c0, ([0 / s1]w4 ↔[c0 / s1]w4), 0 ∈ ℤ)

blocks.name: expmordi
blocks.content: Mantissa ordering relationship for exponentiation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  simp2lr(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), clt, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), clt, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cn0))
  nnnn0(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c2), clt, co(c1, cexp, c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat1), clt, co(c1, cexp, nat1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs1)), clt, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), clt, co(c1, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c1))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), clt, co(c1, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
}

blocks.name: rpexpmord
blocks.content: Mantissa ordering relationship for exponentiation of positive reals. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rpexpmord(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, crp)), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(co(c1, cexp, c0), clt, co(c2, cexp, c0))))
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, crp), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(co(c1, cexp, c0), clt, co(c2, cexp, c0))))
  ltord1(hs0, hs1, c1, crp, c2, co(c1, cexp, c0), co(c2, cexp, c0), co(cv(hs0), cexp, c0), co(cv(hs1), cexp, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cexp, c0)
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, cexp, c0)
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c2, cexp, c0)
  rpssre()
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cexp, c0), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(c0, cn0))
  rpre(cv(hs0))
  nnnn0(c0)
  reexpcl(cv(hs0), c0)
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cv(hs0), cexp, c0), clt, co(cv(hs1), cexp, c0)))
  syl221anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1))), wbr(co(cv(hs0), cexp, c0), clt, co(cv(hs1), cexp, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  rpred(cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1))))
  rpred(cv(hs1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1))))
  simplrr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))
  rpge0d(cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1))))
  simplrl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs1), crp)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cv(hs1)))
  expmordi(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crp)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cexp, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cexp, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cv(hs1), cexp, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(crp)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c1, cexp, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(co(c2, cexp, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cn))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cn))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rpexpmord(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ+)→(c1[<]c2 ↔(c1[^]c0)[<](c2[^]c0)))
} = {
  3impb(c0 ∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℝ+, c2 ∈ ℝ+, (c1[<]c2 ↔(c1[^]c0)[<](c2[^]c0)))
  ltord1(hs0, hs1, c1, crp, c2, (c1[^]c0), (c2[^]c0), (hs0[^]c0), (hs1[^]c0), c0 ∈ ℕ)
  oveq1(hs0, hs1, cexp, c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, cexp, c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c2, cexp, c0)
  rpssre()
  syl2anr(c0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, (hs0[^]c0)∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℕ0)
  rpre(hs0)
  nnnn0(c0)
  reexpcl(hs0, c0)
  ex((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+)), hs0[<]hs1, (hs0[^]c0)[<](hs1[^]c0))
  syl221anc(((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+))∧ hs0[<]hs1), (hs0[^]c0)[<](hs1[^]c0), hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ, 0[≤]hs0, hs0[<]hs1, c0 ∈ ℕ)
  rpred(hs0, ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+))∧ hs0[<]hs1))
  rpred(hs1, ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+))∧ hs0[<]hs1))
  simplrr(c0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs1 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs1)
  rpge0d(hs0, ((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+))∧ hs0[<]hs1))
  simplrl(c0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, hs1 ∈ ℝ+, hs0[<]hs1)
  simpr((c0 ∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+)), hs0[<]hs1)
  simpll(c0 ∈ ℕ, (hs0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ+), hs0[<]hs1)
  expmordi(hs0, hs1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crp)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[^]c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c2[^]c0))
  diff.hs0.c((hs1[^]c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(crp)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((c1[^]c0))
  diff.hs1.c((c2[^]c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ ℕ)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ ℕ)
}
